content: People are really gushing about the Apple goggles, now that they have them in their hands. I still can't get psyched about it. I was late to getting an Apple Watch, and now I wear it every day, can't imagine not wearing it. So maybe I will get one eventually. But my vision is weak, and I kind of doubt it'll work for me. And I would much prefer if Apple had poured their vast resources and creativity into making mass transport work in the Bay Area instead, as a prototype for what might be possible in the rest of the world. That I would cheer, unconditionally.
